item.title: House hardliners complicate ending government shutdown as Speaker Johnson moves ahead
item.description: The U.S. government partially shut down Saturday morning after Congress failed to pass legislation to keep it funded.

item.title: Clintons agree to testify in House Epstein investigation ahead of contempt vote
item.description: Former President Bill Clinton and Hillary Clinton, the 2016 Democratic presidential nominee, will testify in a congressional investigation into the la...

item.title: Trump says DOJ should continue Fed Chair Powell probe 'to the end'
item.description: Sen. Thom Tillis said he would oppose any new Fed nominees until the Powell probe is resolved, the same day Trump announced Kevin Warsh as his Fed cha...

item.title: Trump pardon attorney Ed Martin reportedly sidelined from investigations
item.description: Martin's role at DOJ was narrowed following a protracted feud with Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche, sources told MS NOW.

item.title: Trump says U.S. and India reached trade deal, will lower tariffs immediately
item.description: The U.S. and India have reached a trade deal to lower tariffs, President Donald Trump announced.
